TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public NotInheritable Class TraceWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class TraceWebEventProvider sealed : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 實作事件提供者，傳送 ASP.NET 健康監視事件做為追蹤訊息 (Trace Message)。

span.span: Implements an event provider that sends ASP.NET health-monitoring events as trace messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件類型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 此提供者會傳遞至事件物件。This provider passes events to the object. 它會傳遞衍生自事件類別做為追蹤錯誤，並將所有其他事件傳遞做為追蹤資訊。It passes events that derive from the class as trace errors and passes all other events as trace information. > [!NOTE] > 物件不提供的事件緩衝處理。The object does not provide event buffering. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂提供者的範例，請參閱[How to： 實作健全狀況監視自訂提供者範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下列組態檔摘錄示範如何指定的型別提供者中`healthMonitoring`> 一節。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to specify a provider of type in the `healthMonitoring` section. `add`中的項目`rules`區段可讓您指定的提供者會處理要求處理事件。The `add` element in the `rules` section specifies that the provider will handle request-processing events. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 從提供者的緩衝區中移除所有事件。

span.span: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不能從程式碼直接使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. ASP.NET 健康監視系統會呼叫它。It is called by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. > [!NOTE] > 物件不提供的事件緩衝處理。The object does not provide event buffering.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name
param.span: 在組態檔中用來識別這個提供者的名稱。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: ，指定組態檔中指派給這個提供者的屬性。

span.span: A that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.

summary.span: 設定這個物件的初始值。

span.span: Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫方法來初始化的組態設定和組態檔中所指定的名稱。ASP.NET calls the method to initialize the with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 處理傳遞給提供者的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不能從程式碼直接使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. ASP.NET 健康監視系統會呼叫它。It is called by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. > [!NOTE] > 物件不會執行的事件緩衝處理。The object does not do event buffering.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 執行與關閉提供者關聯的工作。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫裝載 Web 應用程式的應用程式定義域終止時的方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 方法會呼叫以執行工作，可讓應用程式正常結束。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
